Text: I would hug you if I could. I've been looking for the BBS + Final Mix OST for a while, and the 358/2 days and Re:Coded OST's were an added bonus. The quality is superb, can't find a thing wrong with it. Thank you very, very much for sharing this.
I feel like an idiot, I posted the wrong comment on the wrong torrent. But I downloaded this too, and thanks very much for it!
